issue.title: [Doc] Add Flight SQL to implementation status page
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17618](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17618). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At some point, we should probably add a dedicated section for Flight SQL to https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/status.html

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17618?focusedCommentId=17600488) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Dupe of ARROW-16384?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17618?focusedCommentId=17600489) by David Li (lidavidm):*
But thank you for the reminder, I'll try to get this this week

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17618?focusedCommentId=17600494) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Looks like I have a bad memory :-)
